name: You Are Florence
description:
Created within a week for NYU Game Center's Major Studio Fall 2020 class. The theme for that week was Non-human POV

Sound effects were taken from NYU Game Center's Audio Library. 

You awaken in a witch's house with no memory of your past. The witch says she has just the spell to help you regain your memories, but will the memories you regain be true? 

Use WASD to move and the mouse to look around.
Space/Left Click will make the text continue
Right click will center the camera if it gets funky ( sorry about that! )
There are three endings so feel free to try playing the game again for a different ending!
